title: Who is the better actor between Adrien Brody and Sacha Baron Cohen? - Quora

response.answer_text: Adrien Brody is more famous due to his popular films and so he is better in doing more versatile roles but he doesn’t get much recognition due to his limited number of films. Other guy is not that famous. Cheers!
Adrien Brody, if only because Sacha Baron Cohen is more of a comedian and not a completely legit dramatic actor.
